metadata.dc:title: Gyani Maiya
ज्ञानी मैया
metadata.dc:creator: Panigrahi, Subhashish
metadata.dc:subject: kusunda
indigenous
nepal
metadata.dc:description: A formerly hunter-gather community stopped speaking their language for two generations, and linguists have predicted its death, declaring an 83-year-old the last living speaker. Will her lamenting revive the near-extinct language, her only identity?
